title: Workplace Learning Recognition and e-Portfolio Utilization: Practitioner Competency Certification Process

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related basic knowledge and three or more years of field experience
context.additional_context: Learners are in-service professionals focusing on systematically organizing and credentialing informal workplace learning experiences. Digital devices (tablets or laptops) are provided, with e-portfolio completion through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners systematically document informal workplace learning experiences in an e-portfolio and assign metadata (learning content, duration, outcomes).
Learners explain methods to objectify their expertise according to portfolio-based assessment criteria and link it to certification institutions.
Learners establish self-reflection and improvement plans through feedback exchanges with peer learners using an e-portfolio.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
